resources.string: Take a Photo with your Camera
First take or choose a photo
Now select the corners: Start with the top-left corner
And, at last, the bottom-left corner
Are you happy with your choice? Please confirm

string-array.name: textView_corners
string-array.item: Now select the corners: Start with the top-left corner
And, at last, the bottom-left corner
Reposition the image for top-left corner
Reposition the image for top-right corner
Reposition the image for bottom-right corner
Reposition the image for bottom-left corner
Starting from the top, how many rows have been selected?

resources.string:
This application is a project by Lotte Heckmann, Alexander Lewin, Merlin Marek, Birger Nordmann, Yannick Stahl, Florian Vo√ü mentored by the Chair for Theoretical Information Technology of RWTH Aachen University.

 You can decode the facades of the ICT Cubes in Aachen, which are encoded with a coding scheme developed by Georg Boecherer.
 Please refer to http://www.georg-boecherer.de/ict-cubes.html for more information on this topic.
